data.name: Party Words - Deck Pack 1
data.detailed_description:
Purchasing new decks allows you to Host games with that DLC (players do not need to own the DLC to Join).

Deck Pack 1 Includes:
Star Wars Deck
Board Games Deck
Sports Deck
World Geography Deck
data.about_the_game:
Purchasing new decks allows you to Host games with that DLC (players do not need to own the DLC to Join).

Deck Pack 1 Includes:
Star Wars Deck
Board Games Deck
Sports Deck
World Geography Deck
data.short_description: Deck Pack 1 for Party Words! Includes: Star Wars Deck, Board Games Deck, Sports Deck, & World Geography Deck

  • OS: Microsoft Windows Vista or newer (64-bit)
